snippet: LEVINE--Noel. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member Noel Levine and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Noel. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member Noel Levine and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
